price: Enti twe wo ho fri wͻn ho. Ɛda a Ɔfrεfoͻ (Israafiil) bεfrε (wͻn) akͻ asεm kεseε mu no,
arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fatawalla ʿanhum yawma yadʿu al-dāʿi ilā shayin nukurin
